Statute.Title: Nova Scotia Courts Amendment Act, 1992
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Réorganisation judiciaire de la Nouvelle-Écosse, Loi de 1992)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1992, c. 51, except ss. 2(1), 18 and 22, in force 30.01.93 see SI/93-11; ss. 2(1), 18 and 22 repealed before coming into force 31.12.2011 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3
